mapper.insert: INSERT INTO create_board (title, content, system_registrar_id, system_updater_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{systemRegistrarId}, #{systemUpdaterId})
mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(order by id desc) as num , id , title , content , system_registrar_id , system_updater_id , DATE_FORMAT(system_registrar_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS system_registrar_datetime , DATE_FORMAT(system_update_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS system_update_datetime FROM create_board
